ygData.subject: Re: Trying to add to the confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I dont know.  We were discussing quests when he mentioned tattered armor, and when he did, my eyes lit up like a kid on Christmas.  I always thought
ygData.messageBody:
>

I dont know. We were discussing quests when he mentioned tattered armor, and
when he did, my eyes lit up like a kid on Christmas. I always thought thermal
cloaks would provide elemental protection.

>
>
> Actually I've done the quest it's a bit drawn out, but I did get "tattered"
> gloves.
> So, it appears we must repeat this quest again and again to get a cloak?
>
> Which would make sense, sort of, if Thermal Cloaks are REALLY cool.
> (Ok, I'm dreaming about Thermal Cloaks doing damage like a Flame Shield)
>
> -Zikkin
